name: The Worst Game In The World

description:
hey human! this game is the worst game in the world! p.s this is for memes and stuff,it only has 4 levels so you can finish this game in just 5 minutes or less idk,but hope you had a little laugh while playing this!,(this game was purposely made bad for the funnies)

that's literally it
